name: react-game
description: A React renderer for game development - React Native for games

scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run demo:types && npm run demo:dev
scripts.demo:build: npm run build && npm run demo:types && webpack --config demo/webpack.config.js
scripts.demo:watch: npm run build && (node dist/cli/index.js watch-manifests demo/manifests &) && npm run demo:dev
scripts.demo:types-watch: npm run build && node dist/cli/index.js watch-manifests demo/manifests

author: ReactGame Team
